name: A Sky of Stars: Scarlet Dusk
name_original: A Sky of Stars: Scarlet Dusk
description:
⊰⋅⋅•⋅⋅•∙∘☽༓☾∘∙•⋅⋅⋅•⋅⋅⊰

You have received a letter from Goldwell's Magical Institute, marking you as a potential mage and inviting you to attend education at their institution. The letter has asked you to be present at their student registration day, and so you make your way to your local Transportation Door to go.

Goldwell is home to magic, learning, and students eager to explore and discover the wonders that only those with magical abilities can uncover. Step into the shoes of a Goldwell student, attend classes, form friendships and relationships, and navigate the world of magic, mystery and midnight strolls.

⊰⋅⋅•⋅⋅•∙∘☽༓☾∘∙•⋅⋅⋅•⋅⋅⊰

A Sky of Stars is an interactive fiction where you play as a mage student attending Goldwell Magical Institute. Features include:

  • Play as male, female or non-binary.
  • Customize your character.
  • Form friendships and relationships with a cast of characters.
  • Attend classes and perform your duties as you see fit.
  • Uncover and solve mysteries on your own or with your friends.

⊰⋅⋅•⋅⋅•∙∘☽༓☾∘∙•⋅⋅⋅•⋅⋅⊰

Please consider donating or sharing the game to help support me and share your thoughts in the comments below. Any feedback is appreciated!

You can also find news and updates on the  Sky of Stars Tumblr. 

Welcome to Goldwell's.
